goods, updated information, ladies and gentlemen,
Ho Chi Minh City police have just destroyed a
network of people buying and selling human body parts,
four people were arrested and had been
buying and selling kidneys since last year to gain
illegal profits.  more than 12 billion
VND through the investigation process, the police agency
determined that in 2017, because he needed money to spend,
Bui Tien Luc, living in Ninh Binh province, was
selling kidneys on social networking sites and
was asked by a man to buy them after
entering the city.  Ho Chi Minh City to sell
kidneys to get to know the subjects Tran Thanh
Hoa living in Thu Duc city Nguyen Thanh
Phong living in Kien Giang province Phan Thanh Hai
living in Dong Nai province took advantage of the huge demand for
kidney organ transplants since the beginning of
last year  The above four subjects formed a
kidney trading ring to find sellers and
people in need of kidney transplants, conducted
tests on accommodation while
waiting for a kidney transplant and falsified necessary documents.
Police initially determined  The
subjects made 28
kidney transactions, including 13 successful transplant cases.
Each case needed to buy a kidney.
The subjects called prices from 400 million VND
to more than 1.1 billion VND but only paid
the seller.  from 260 million to 400
million VND, illegal profits of more than 12 billion
VND, currently the police are consolidating evidence,
